ud2.8:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kundikayam viharati kundadhanavane.
ud2.8:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena suppavasa koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:1.4: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa dukkhahi tibbahi kharahi katukahi vedanahi phuttha tihi vitakkehi adhivaseti:
ud2.8:1.5: “sammasambuddho vata so bhagava yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya dhammam deseti;
ud2.8:1.6: suppatipanno vata tassa bhagavato savakasangho yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya patipanno;
ud2.8:1.7: susukham vata tam nibbanam yatthidam evarupam dukkham na samvijjati”ti.
ud2.8:2.1: Atha kho suppavasa koliyadhita samikam amantesi:
ud2.8:2.2: “ehi tvam, ayyaputta, yena bhagava tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi; appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam puccha:
ud2.8:2.3: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita bhagavato pade sirasa vandati; appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati’ti.
ud2.8:2.5: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:2.6: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa dukkhahi tibbahi kharahi katukahi vedanahi phuttha tihi vitakkehi adhivaseti—
ud2.8:2.7: sammasambuddho vata so bhagava yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya dhammam deseti;
ud2.8:2.8: suppatipanno vata tassa bhagavato savakasangho yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya patipanno;
ud2.8:2.9: susukham vata tam nibbanam yatthidam evarupam dukkham na samvijjati’”ti.
ud2.8:3.1: “Paraman”ti kho so koliyaputto suppavasaya koliyadhitaya patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud2.8:3.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho koliyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud2.8:3.3: “suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita bhagavato pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati;
ud2.8:3.5: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:3.6: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa dukkhahi tibbahi kharahi katukahi vedanahi phuttha tihi vitakkehi adhivaseti—
ud2.8:3.7: sammasambuddho vata so bhagava yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya dhammam deseti;
ud2.8:3.8: suppatipanno vata tassa bhagavato savakasangho yo imassa evarupassa dukkhassa pahanaya patipanno;
ud2.8:3.9: susukham vata nibbanam yatthidam evarupam dukkham na samvijjati’”ti.
ud2.8:4.1: “Sukhini hotu suppavasa koliyadhita; aroga arogam puttam vijayatu”ti.
ud2.8:4.2: Saha vacana ca pana bhagavato suppavasa koliyadhita sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijayi.
ud2.8:5.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so koliyaputto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena sakam gharam tena paccayasi.
ud2.8:5.2: Addasa kho so koliyaputto suppavasam koliyadhitaram sukhinim arogam arogam puttam vijatam.
ud2.8:5.4: “acchariyam vata bho, abbhutam vata bho, tathagatassa mahiddhikata mahanubhavata, yatra hi namayam suppavasa koliyadhita saha vacana ca pana bhagavato sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijayissati”ti.
ud2.8:6.1: Atha kho suppavasa koliyadhita samikam amantesi:
ud2.8:6.2: “ehi tvam, ayyaputta, yena bhagava tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi:
ud2.8:6.3: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita bhagavato pade sirasa vandati’ti;
ud2.8:6.5: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:6.6: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa etarahi sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijata.
ud2.8:6.7: Sa sattaham buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:6.8: Adhivasetu kira, bhante, bhagava suppavasaya koliyadhitaya satta bhattani saddhim bhikkhusanghena’”ti.
ud2.8:7.1: “Paraman”ti kho so koliyaputto suppavasaya koliyadhitaya patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud2.8:7.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so koliyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud2.8:8.1: “Suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita bhagavato pade sirasa vandati;
ud2.8:8.3: ‘suppavasa, bhante, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:8.4: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa etarahi sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijata.
ud2.8:8.5: Sa sattaham buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:8.6: Adhivasetu kira, bhante, bhagava suppavasaya koliyadhitaya satta bhattani saddhim bhikkhusanghena’”ti.
ud2.8:9.1: Tena kho pana samayena annatarena upasakena buddhappamukho bhikkhusangho svatanaya bhattena nimantito hoti.
ud2.8:9.2: So ca upasako ayasmato mahamoggallanassa upatthako hoti.
ud2.8:9.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam mahamoggallanam amantesi:
ud2.8:9.4: “ehi tvam, moggallana, yena so upasako tenupasankama; upasankamitva tam upasakam evam vadehi:
ud2.8:9.5: ‘suppavasa, avuso, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dharesi.
ud2.8:9.6: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa etarahi sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijata.
ud2.8:9.7: Sa sattaham buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:9.8: Karotu suppavasa koliyadhita satta bhattani, paccha tvam karissasi’ti.
ud2.8:10.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato patissutva yena so upasako tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam upasakam etadavoca:
ud2.8:10.2: “suppavasa, avuso, koliyadhita satta vassani gabbham dhareti.
ud2.8:10.3: Sattaham mulhagabbha sa etarahi sukhini aroga arogam puttam vijata.
ud2.8:10.4: Sa sattaham buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:10.5: Karotu suppavasa koliyadhita satta bhattani, paccha tvam karissasi”ti.
ud2.8:11.1: “Sace me, bhante, ayyo mahamoggallano tinnam dhammanam patibhogo—
ud2.8:11.3: karotu suppavasa koliyadhita satta bhattani, pacchaham karissami”ti.
ud2.8:11.4: “Dvinnam kho te aham, avuso, dhammanam patibhogo—
ud2.8:12.1: “Sace me, bhante, ayyo mahamoggallano dvinnam dhammanam patibhogo—
ud2.8:12.3: karotu suppavasa koliyadhita satta bhattani, pacchaham karissami”ti.
ud2.8:13.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam upasakam sannapetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud2.8:13.3: karotu suppavasa koliyadhita satta bhattani, paccha so karissati”ti.
ud2.8:14.1: Atha kho suppavasa koliyadhita sattaham buddhappamukham bhikkhusangham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi,
ud2.8:14.2: tanca darakam bhagavantam vandapesi sabbanca bhikkhusangham.
ud2.8:15.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto tam darakam etadavoca:
ud2.8:15.2: “kacci te, daraka, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci na kinci dukkhan”ti?
ud2.8:15.3: “Kuto me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam, kuto yapaniyam.
ud2.8:16.2: “putto me dhammasenapatina saddhim manteti”ti attamana pamudita pitisomanassajata ahosi.
ud2.8:16.3: Atha kho bhagava suppavasam koliyadhitaram attamanam pamuditam pitisomanassajatam viditva suppavasam koliyadhitaram etadavoca:
ud2.8:17.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
